text: An anesthesiologist (also anaesthesiologist) is a doctor of medicine. An anesthesiologist (American English) or anaesthetist (British English) is a professional trained in anesthesia and perioperative medicine. Terminology varies between countries. The main jobs of an anesthesiologist are: *Providing anesthesia to a patient undergoing surgery *Intensive care medicine *Medical emergency medicine *Palliative care The first anesthesiologist was John Snow (18131858). category:Medical specialties category:Healthcare occupations
